summary:
Experienced geography teacher, researcher and author with international aspirations. 

* Passionate about geography and education.
* Life purpose in supporting and guiding adolescents, in terms of subject content and personal development.
* Continuously maintaining and improving my abilities, through e.g. language courses and publications.

[{'company': {'id': 11409666, 'name': 'ISW Gasthuislaan', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D0BAQEDaSIzYS4sbw/company-logo_400_400/0/1519952477058?e=1700092800&v=beta&t=4mTguiwv7tkxOqO10FRykXejp5ulRSd91wQQG2NLBac', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/isw-gasthuislaan/', 'employees': {'start': 51, 'end': 200}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': "'s Gravenzande, The Netherlands", 'date': {'start': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'company': 'ISW Gasthuislaan', 'description': "As a geography teacher at a school for higher secondary education it is possible for me to combine my love for the subject matter of geography with my personal preference to work in a public environment in a position that will benefit society. To be able to indulge and challenge 12- to 18-year-old students in geographic contexts and issues on a daily basis is not only a thrill, indeed, it has become somewhat of a raison d'etre. 

An overview of the responsibilities that I have (had) in this position:
Geography Teacher
Head of Geography Department
Student Mentor (1 gymnasium/vwo-plus, 4 havo, 5 havo, 6 vwo)
Designer of Geography Education on Gymnasium Level
Member of Gymnasium Think Tank 
Creator of Test Material 
Creator of Course Material 
Creator of Cross-Sectional Course/Project Material
Creator of Excursion/Field Work (Amsterdam, Rotterdam, Iceland)
Supervisor during Excursion/Field Work
Supervisor of Final Theses
Adviser to Student Council
Member of Appointment Advisory Committee (Geography Department)
Member of Appointment Advisory Committee (Headmaster)", 'title': 'Geography Teacher & Head of Geography Department', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': 19952, 'name': 'ThiemeMeulenhoff', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E0BAQHEYGcIreAJ2Q/company-logo_400_400/0/1559639488112?e=1700092800&v=beta&t=ROXU-uhOmrmC2f_otH21jsQZSbd8-iF74ou5YVOM1ek', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/thiememeulenhoff/', 'employees': {'start': 201, 'end': 500}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Amersfoort, The Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'company': 'ThiemeMeulenhoff', 'description': 'Author of various chapters in a line of textbooks on geography with a nation-wide circulation and a 55 percent market share.

In this position I have increased my experience with social interaction and communication, introduced myself to working in a commercial office environment, further explored working in an international environment, improved my computer dexterity and enhanced my knowledge of logistic procedures.', 'title': 'Customer sales representative', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': 3224132, 'name': 'Evento', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D0BAQGkHvG0dgFdgg/company-logo_400_400/0/1625130858136?e=1700092800&v=beta&t=B4IfOclqrDvUxKuTq1BqZp6nsNTC7Ip3mDpwjgaFJMA', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/pagodetent-com-all4events-/', 'employees': {'start': 2, 'end': 10}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2013}, 'end': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2013}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Oldebroek, The Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2013}, 'end': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2013}}, 'company': 'EVENTO event rentals', 'description': 'At Evento Party & Event-Rent I have mainly been responsible for creating and editing the website content, as well as partly responsible for its programming. Working at Evento has simultaneously extended my computer dexterity, tested my editing skills, reminded me of the perks and value of manual labour and contributed to my experience in working within a team of people.', 'title': 'Web editor, operational employee', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': 715597, 'name': 'NE DistriService', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D0BAQEMYKU9ylv1Cw/company-logo_400_400/0/1519893473958?e=1700092800&v=beta&t=veXbWUXx2IblW9-J-JkawZCbHtM9nFwtTqJQ5bymvi0', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/ne-distriservice/', 'employees': {'start': 51, 'end': 200}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2001}, 'end': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2013}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Nunspeet, The Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2001}, 'end': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2013}}, 'company': 'NE DistriService', 'description': 'At the NE DistriService I have mainly functioned as an express delivery driver. This position involved daily trips throughout The Netherlands, often over 60 addresses, 12 hours and 600 kilometers long. The delivery concerned delicate window decorations at interior design and hardware stores. In addition I would occasionally serve as a customer service representative performing light office activities. 

Working as an express courier has offered me the opportunity to explore virtually every square kilometer of my home country, which is more than I could ask for as a geographer in this position. It has also given me ample experience with highly-flexible manual labour, through which I have learnt its incredible value in terms of discipline, mentality and regarding my own privileges. Odd as it might seem, I have thoroughly enjoyed being a delivery driver, since it is an honest job in which I visited every corner of my country.', 'title': 'Express courier, customer service representative', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': 354116, 'name': 'CultuurBewust.nl', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E0BAQEq0aaYRsDD7A/company-logo_400_400/0/1519890200834?e=1700092800&v=beta&t=Q4pNR3T7x5imL89s4A0f-U7s4PM7gj7NiyucDQJlb8E', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/cleeft/', 'employees': {'start': 51, 'end': 200}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2009}, 'end': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2010}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Utrecht, The Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2009}, 'end': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2010}}, 'company': 'CLEEFT', 'description': 'When I started writing for Cultuurbewust.nl in 2009, the online platform was still in its infancy. As part of the team that focused on Film & Cinema it was my responsibility to write reviews on new releases. Consequently, a number of reviews have been published on the website. 

Working at Cultuurbewust.nl has given me the chance to explore writing website content and articles for an audience of reasonable size. It has therefore tested my ability to write attractive content, while it also improved my analytical capabilities in writing reviews of films.', 'title': 'Film critic (freelance)', 'employment_type': None}]}]
